title: Southeast Asia: Burma and Thailand

description: Burma and Thailand are similar in their geography and in the ways of life of their people. Old traditions guide much of the life of the people of both countries. However, both Rangoon and Bangkok are modern-looking. This film examines the similarities of the two countries.
